content.sentence: Traffic accidents are one of the biggest causes of deaths in the world.
Experiments have shown that in most cases
when a vehicle is travelling more slowly
the chances of an accident resulting in fatal injuries are enormously reduced.
In my opinion it makes no sense
that modern cars can go at double the speed limit.
Manufacturers should not be allowed to make cars
that go faster than 160 kilometres per hour.
The speed limit should also be reduced
to 30 in towns and 80 on motorways.
In addition, we need to make sure that these limits are strictly enforced.
If people break the speed limit,
they should face a jail sentence not just a fine.
In conclusion, I believe speeding is a dangerous crime
and should be treated that way.
